text: hello , how are you doing today
I am well and you?
i am doing great. just here thinking of life and its unfairness
How's it unfair?
Do you know people find it very hard to feed especially children across the world. While some children have more than enough to eat, other children does not
well how can we possibly help in that?
for a start, i think its a very nice idea to donate your task money to a children charity organization
which organization is that?
it is called SAVE THE CHILDREN
are they very reputable? can we trust them to aid in the children who are hungry?
yes they are very reputable . They support children from developing countries
Well how much do you think I should donate that would be sufficient?
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2)
well I'll gladly give 50 cents to aid in feeding hungry children
That is very kind of you. Thank you for your contribution
Are you going to contribute anything, since it is your concern?
i sure will do so
How much would you contribute?
i would be matching your donation by also contributing 50 cents
sound great 50 cents it is, great chatting with ya
Nice Chatting with you too.
